participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to solve complicated IT problems.
I am content with being a welder and rock climber.
i work as a lifeguard.
I have 2 sisters, but I'm not sure if my car is sentient.
I love listening to classical music while I organize my office supplies on rainy days.

participant_2.background:
I'm not really into hobbies, but I love to play board games with my family.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
I make my living as a professional bowler.
I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier.
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite thing to do on a rainy day?
Hi! I love to play board games with my family.
Nice! I love to listen to classical music and organize my office supplies on rainy days.
That sounds like a really relaxing way to spend a rainy day!
Yeah, it really is. I'm a welder and rock climber, so I don't get a lot of opportunities to relax.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to learn how to rock climb.
You should! It's a lot of fun and a great way to get in shape.
I might just have to do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What do you do for a living?
That's so cool! I've never met a professional bowler before.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be tough sometimes.
I bet! I can't even imagine how hard it would be to bowl professionally.
It's definitely not easy, but it's worth it when you get to compete in tournaments and win money.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're great at it.
Thank you! I try my best
